usage: Used for light strength and resistance training, toning and sculpting arms, shoulders and back in home workouts or fitness classes.
key_features: Set of 2 dumbbells for resistance training; each dumbbell weighs 0.5 kg
Pink cast iron dumbbells are neoprene-coated for durability
Neoprene coating helps protect the user, floor and other fitness equipment
Hexagonal shape for easy stacking and roll-free use
Easy-grip neoprene coating for a secure hold
Ideal for fitness classes or at-home workout routines
Helps tone and sculpt arms, shoulders and back
Soft neoprene surface with superfine processing, easy to clean
Neoprene coating designed not to fade or crack in daily exercise
Solid integral cast iron interior with soft neoprene exterior coating
KAKSS branding and 0.5 KG weight marking printed on dumbbell ends
ai_description: A compact pair of pink hexagonal dumbbells with a smooth neoprene coating and rounded ends. Each end cap clearly shows the KAKSS logo and 0.5 KG weight in white. The soft, matte finish and hex shape suggest a comfortable, non-slip grip and roll-free stability on flat surfaces.
target_audience: Home exercisers, beginners, and fitness enthusiasts seeking light pink neoprene-coated dumbbells for gym or at-home workouts.
product_name: Kakss Neoprene Dumbbells Set for Gym Exercise
